title: Flask of Gold
summaries: The Flask of Gold is a flask that increases the number of coins dropped by enemies. While under the influence of a Flask of Gold, melee (and Whip) attacks will inflict enemies with Midas, causing them to drop 10%-50% more coins.

statistics.Tooltip: Melee and Whip attacks make enemies drop more gold
